talk: just continue talking, no special function should be called
end: stop or end talking, no special function should be called
bpm: bpm related function, get beat seconds from bpm, or get bpm from given beat seconds
get_note_freq: get frequency of a given note, e.g. C4 -> 261.63 Hz
get_freq_note: get note of a frequency, e.g. 261.63 Hz -> C4
